thread.title: John M
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by John M

author: John M
title: John M
text:
I have used TFT for many years and have had no issues ever with the work or the tires. They do a great job of making sure you get a good deal and listen to your concerns.
I ordered a set of TOYO Versado's on Monday for an install on Tuesday but due to the snow events lately they did not come in until today. The price shown for the Noir's was about $100/ ea. Great price and a great tire.
Nothing like driving on a new set of tires!
Thank you TFT
John M.
2006 Accord EX-L
